volatility3.plugins.windows.info.Info.description: Show OS & kernel details of the memory sample being analyzed.

volatility3.plugins.windows.pstree.PsTre.description: Plugin for listing processes in a tree based on their parent process ID.

volatility3.plugins.windows.iat.IAT.description: Extract Import Address Table to list API functions used by a program contained in external libraries.

volatility3.plugins.windows.pslist.PsLis.description: Lists the processes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.dlllist.DllL.description: Lists the loaded modules in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.malfind.Malf.description: Lists process memory ranges that potentially contain injected code.

volatility3.plugins.windows.callbacks.Ca.description: Lists kernel callbacks and notification routines.

volatility3.plugins.windows.devicetree.D.description: Listing tree based on drivers and attached devices in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.driverirp.Dr.description: List IRPs for drivers in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.drivermodule.description: Determines if any loaded drivers were hidden by a rootkit.

volatility3.plugins.windows.driverscan.D.description: Scans for drivers present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.filescan.Fil.description: Scans for file objects present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.getsids.GetS.description: Print the SIDs owning each process.

volatility3.plugins.windows.ldrmodules.L.description: Lists the loaded modules in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.mbrscan.MBRS.description: Scans for and parses potential Master Boot Records (MBRs).

volatility3.plugins.windows.modscan.ModS.description: Scans for modules present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.mutantscan.M.description: Scans for mutexes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.netscan.NetS.description: Scans for network objects present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.netstat.NetS.description: Traverses network tracking structures present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.processghost.description: Lists processes whose DeletePending bit is set or whose FILE_OBJECT is set to 0.

volatility3.plugins.windows.psscan.PsSca.description: Scans for processes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.psxview.PsXV.description: Lists all processes found via four methods described in 'The Art of Memory Forensics' to help identify hidden processes.

volatility3.plugins.windows.skeleton_key.description: Looks for signs of Skeleton Key malware.

volatility3.plugins.windows.symlinkscan..description: Scans for links present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.timers.Timer.description: Print kernel timers and associated module DPCs.

linux.name: volatility3.plugins.linux.pstree.PsTree
linux.description: Plugin for listing processes in a tree based on their parent process ID.
